english.segment1: A great injustice is happening, we can't look away
english.segment2: Innocent lives are broken right here, every day
english.segment3: There's no use pretending that we are unaware
english.segment4: Nothing here is changing til somebody cares
english.segment11: Before the dawn of creation they had God's eye
english.segment12: Now they're not even given one chance at life
english.segment13: We can't keep pretending that we are unaware
english.segment14: Nothing here is changing if we don't care
